attributes.action: Make it compulsory for people with garden hot tubs to pay for, and have a water meter fitted to their property.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it compulsory for people who have garden jacuzzies, hot tubs, swimming pools and ponds, to have to buy and pay for the fitting of a water meter on their property, in order that they are at least paying for the vulgar misuse of fresh drinking water.
